alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 6:46AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, central Walton and western Holmes Counties through 730 AM CDT... At 645 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along extending from 12 miles north of De Funiak Springs to 7 miles southeast of Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds between 30 and 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Geneva, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Ponce De Leon, Cluster Springs, Gaskin, Portland, Alpine Heights, Lytle, Darlington, Marl, Arrant Settlement, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Glendale, Pleasant Ridge and Center Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
